main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a bright object that moved silently in a horizontal path before disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The object was observed 1.5 miles away and appeared to flash before disappearing., The sighting lasted for 10 seconds and occurred at night., No physical evidence or photographs were obtained from the sighting., The witness described the object as dark with a green halo and larger than a match head., The weather conditions at the time were not specified, and the sky's visibility was unclear.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: Carl F. Eilson, aged 29, reported the sighting.
